title: Logged in and suddenly I lost all my friends
body:
So I log in and wait through the Login queue and then in the client my Friendlist is suddenly empty and I can't add them back or anything.
Rito I want my friends back pls D:

replies.body:
Hey SoulEvansX,

We're aware of this issue over on the EUW at the moment. We have a post over on our [Service Status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw) page. You should check this out as it will have the most up to date information about this chat issue!

Plus, I can confirm that your Friend list is still intact!
Give it time, your friends list will restore itself in a day or two.
